sentence: for small- to medium-sized banks, in particular, the growth in cre concentrations has been significant.

this growth in cre concentrations is understandable as community-based banks have experienced increasing competitive pressure from larger banks and other financial services institutions in other lending areas.

compounding our concern about rising cre concentrations is feedback from our examiners that some institutions' risk-management practices have not kept pace with the growth in their cre concentrations.
